caption.p: Zika cases predict cases of GBS. (A) Rio de Janeiro state; (B) Metropolitan Areas I and II. The goodness of fit of the model based on Zika + dengue virus is lower than that of the Zika virus only model. For both models, accuracy is higher in urban areas than at the scale of the state of Rio de Janeiro, which is 16% rural. [Colour figure can be viewed at http://www.wileyonlinelibrary.com]
